alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:51PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Walworth, east central Racine and Kenosha Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1050 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wind Point to near Browns Lake to near Darien. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Antioch, Lake Geneva, Sturtevant, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Winthrop Harbor, Twin Lakes, Genoa City, Walworth, Silver Lake, Wind Point, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Channel Lake, Lake Catherine, Powers Lake, and Pell Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.
